data.title: The African Film & Arts Festival (TAFF)
data.meta_description: We all want and deserve to find that one elusive love, but how far should one go to achieve their heart’s desire? Meet Vivienne, an academically accomplished and well to do woman. She’s a Medical Doctor by day and member of the 'lonely hearts club' by night. Never been married and aware that her biological clock is ticking, Vivienne is desperate to find a man to warm her heart and of course, her bed. As luck would have it, Vivienne finally finds herself in an undesirable relationship. Can she ever recover? It all lies in the Affairs of the Heart.
data.text:
WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

A festival that focuses on stories about Africa and films made by Africans is long overdue!

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

This is exciting news for Africa, Friends of Africa, and the Dallas metroplex. Finally, we have an African Film Festival!!
